app_description: Translator app is a language translator app that allows you to communicate effectively world wide. Translator app is a powerful voice translator and dictionary app which translates in over a 100 languages You can use the app to: Translate Audio Translate picture Translate camara Translate text Furthermore It s available in offline Mode to save your few bucks while you are on roaming Get instant translations between 100 different languages for example spanish to english translator english to korean translator arabic to english translator chinese to english translator german to english translator french to english translator english to polish translator Features: Image translator photo translator voice translator Available in male or female voices. Includes synonyms and meanings. Phrasebook With over 250 predefined phrases. Use your camera for visual translator or dictionary See and hear the pronunciation of the words Simply point and translate foreign text to English Apple Watch App Transliteration Sharing Favorites History and much more. The history of your translations will be saved on your device Voice settings: choose male or female voice and its speed app provides the most up to date translations.
